bedroom: phǒm yùu nai hɔ̂ɔŋ nɔɔn → I'm in the bedroom
bathroom: khun jà bpai hɔ̂ɔŋ náam rʉ́? → Are you going to the bathroom?
dining-room: rao gin khâaw nai hɔ̂ɔŋ aa-hǎan → We eat in the dining room
living-room: chǎn chɔ̂ɔp nâŋ lên thîi hɔ̂ɔŋ nâŋ lên → I like sitting in the living room
kitchen: phǒm gin khâaw nai hɔ̂ɔŋ khrua → I cook in the kitchen
toilet: khun bpai hɔ̂ɔŋ sûam mâi? → Are you going to the toilet?
balcony: rao nâŋ lên thîi rá-biiang → We sit on the balcony
garden: chǎn chɔ̂ɔp dtam sǔan → I like gardening
garage: rót yùu nai rooŋ-rót → The car is in the garage
stairs: khun bpai ban-dai mâi? → Are you taking the stairs?
elevator: rao bpai líft → We take the elevator
apartment: phǒm yùu nai à-phâat-mén → I live in an apartment
condo: khun yùu nai khɔɔn-doo mâi? → Do you live in a condo?
house: bâan khun yùu thîi nǎi? → Where is your house?
room: hɔ̂ɔŋ nîi yùu thîi nǎi? → Where is this room?
building: tʉ̀k nîi sǔng mâak → This building is very tall
floor-level: khun yùu chán thîi jài? → Which floor are you on?
laundry-room: phǒm sák phâa nai hɔ̂ɔŋ sák-phâa → I wash clothes in the laundry room
storage-room: khun gèp khɔ̌ɔŋ nai hɔ̂ɔŋ gèp khɔ̌ɔŋ → You store things in the storage room
rooftop: rao bpai dàat-fáa → We go to the rooftop
yard: lûuk yùu nai sà-nǎam yâa → The child is in the yard
